title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Vasukivka and Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted ...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Vasukivka and Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novyy, Druzhba of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
